description:
Safely on the supply ship, Stork, Midge, Doc, and Marbo are finally able to relax a little in the aftermath of the space station`s demise and are on their way back to Earth. Suddenly, a package of space food takoyaki is spotted floating nearby and unable to let it pass them by, the bugs devise a plan to retrieve their delicious target. After much struggle to retrieve the takoyaki the trio of insects settles down to enjoy the long-awaited good meal, but trouble soon rears it`s head when Marbo eats his portion too fast.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mission! Extravehicular Activity / Farting in Space Is Strictly Prohibited
Mission! Sengai Katsudou / Uchuu de Onara wa Genkin na no Da
ミッション! 船外活動 / 宇宙でオナラは厳禁なのだ
